Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring multiple dwelling owners to provide notice to their tenants prior to temporarily or permanently making building amenities unavailable
Items.MatterName: Requiring multiple dwelling owners to provide notice to their tenants prior to temporarily or permanently making building amenities unavailable.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the New York city building code in relation to the display of artwork on temporary protective structures on construction sites
Items.MatterName: Display of artwork on temporary protective structures on construction sites.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to after hours work authorization
A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring newly constructed multiple dwellings to provide adequate space to store and sort organic waste
Items.MatterName: Requiring newly constructed multiple dwellings to provide adequate space to store and sort organic waste.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to tenant data privacy
